definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Chapter One is the basic connotation of social security law system.
sentences.chinese: 第一章为社会保障法律制度的基本涵义。

sentences.english: It's writing everything we know and what it means.
sentences.chinese: 写出我们知道的东西，以及它们的涵义。

sentences.english: So names that are difficult to pronounce seem to have negative connotations?
sentences.chinese: 由上所述，发音难念的名字难道就有不祥的涵义吗？

sentences.english: True poetry accumulates meaning every time it is read.
sentences.chinese: 真正的好诗愈念涵义愈丰富。

sentences.english: Buddhist "current outlook" and "current quantum" comprise respectively three layers of connotation.
sentences.chinese: 佛教的“现观”“现量”各有三层涵义。

sentences.english: The word Liberty in Yan Fu's articles has different meanings.
sentences.chinese: 在严复的文章中，自由一词有多层涵义，应区别对待。

sentences.english: A poet always searches how to reinvest words with new meaning.
sentences.chinese: 诗人总是在探索如何赋予词以新的涵义。

sentences.english: This article plans to the Lizu frog grain worship implication to carry on the tracing.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图对黎族青蛙纹的崇拜涵义追本溯源。

sentences.english: If you got an animal doll, lets we reveal the meaning of it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你得到了一个动物娃娃，让我揭示他的涵义。

sentences.english: Since Plato, philosophers have sought out the meaning of justice.
sentences.chinese: 从柏拉图以还，哲学家寻求正义的涵义。

sentences.english: Chapter One explores the definition and the scope of judicial review of antitrust decisions.
sentences.chinese: 第一章探讨反垄断司法审查管辖的涵义与范围。

sentences.english: Chapter II: Analysis of the contemporary university teachers in the process of role-playing a variety of difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 重点剖析大学教师角色困境的涵义及其表示形式。

sentences.english: Gifts meaning is a symbolic expression of it sender to you.
sentences.chinese: 礼物的涵义是送礼对者你的象征性的表达。

sentences.english: But the implications of that gap have not yet been fully digested.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这个差异的涵义却还没有被完全消化。

sentences.english: This is"the double teacher"meaning which this article mentions.
sentences.chinese: 这是本文所提到的“双师型”教师的涵义。

sentences.english: Understanding gift meaning makes you more appreciate the person with their gift.
sentences.chinese: 理解礼物的涵义使你更好地感激送礼物的人。

definition: meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
to contain in a concealed form/to keep covered up/implicit
